title: Emma Stone Reveals “Beautiful” Stage Name She Went by for Six Months
summary: The actress, whose real name is Emily Stone, revealed why she changed her stage name from Riley to Emma after a guest appearance on 'Malcolm in the Middle.'

title: Sabrina Carpenter Kicks Off Short n’ Sweet Tour’s Final North American Leg: How to Secure Sold-Out Tickets
summary: The singer is rounding out her 72-show run in five major cities: Pittsburgh, NYC, Nashville, Toronto and LA. Here's how fans can snag (and save on) seats with THR-exclusive promo codes.
